comment.note: A vehicle on Saturday passed through this stop sign at the intersection of Spencer and Greenwich roads in Homer Township and crashed into a home at 9010 Spencer Road, pictured in the background at left. The vehicle's driver, 58-year-old Doris Williams, her passenger, 53-year-old Rosemarie Kinney, both were killed in the crash. The couple who lives at the home was present, but not injured. NICK GLUNT/GAZETTE
